subject: Surveys for Cash + Prizes
body:
Earn
 “Market Points,” redeemable for cash, for every survey you take!
 It’s so simple, the surveys come straight to your email inbox, and then
 you are just a few clicks away from your cash reward! Sign me up now! 






It’s
 Quick! It’s Easy! It Pays!
